titles.title: Post-9/11 Military Family Fair Education Opportunity Act
To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the time period in which an individual may transfer entitlement of Post-9/11 Educational Assistance benefits to dependents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Post-9/11 Military Family Fair Education Opportunity Act - Extends to ten years after the date of an individual's last discharge or release from active duty the period in which such individual may transfer to his or her dependents any remaining entitlement to post-9/11 educational assistance benefits available through the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA).
